section.title: Install Options
section.para: JBoss Developer Studio can be installed in a number of different ways.

You can install JBoss Developer Studio, packaged with Eclipse and dependent third party plug-ins, with a universal installer for all operating systems. The installer is provided in a .jar file and is available from the Customer Service Portal. The source code is available for inspection as a .zip file at the same location.
Alternatively, if you already have Eclipse on your system you may prefer to use JBoss Developer Studio BYOE. You install JBoss Developer Studio from Eclipse Marketplace with this option.
